import React, { Suspense } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import MainLayout from '../layouts/MainLayout'; import BackgroundPattern from '../components/BackgroundPattern'; import LoadingAnimation from '../components/LoadingAnimation'; // Lazy load components that are not needed immediately const SkillsVisualization = React.lazy(() => import('../components/SkillsVisualization')); const ProjectsSection = React.lazy(() => import('../components/ProjectsSection')); const ExperienceSection = React.lazy(() => import('../components/ExperienceSection')); // Loading fallback component const SectionLoader = () => (
); const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const fadeUpVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: (i: number) => ({ opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { delay: 0.1 * i, duration: 0.5, ease: "easeOut" } }) }; return ( {/* Hero Section */}
Hi, my name is Zubair Ahmad. I transform data into insights. I'm a Data Analyst and Software Engineer specializing in building data-driven solutions and creating insightful visualizations. Currently focused on helping organizations make better decisions through data analysis and modern web technologies. document.getElementById('projects')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })} > View My Work
document.getElementById('contact')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })} > Get in Touch
Scroll to explore
{/* About Section */}

About Me

As a Data Analyst and Software Engineer, I bridge the gap between complex data analysis and user-friendly software solutions. My journey combines technical expertise with a passion for transforming data into actionable insights.

At the Centre for Strategic and Contemporary Research (CSCR), I've led data-driven research initiatives and developed innovative analysis tools. My experience includes creating custom data visualization solutions and implementing machine learning models for predictive analytics.

I specialize in full-stack web development using the MERN stack, with a focus on creating interactive data visualizations and building efficient, scalable applications.

Education & Certifications

  • Data Science & Analysis

    Certification with specialization in predictive modeling

  • Full Stack Development

    MERN Stack specialization with focus on data-driven applications

  • Machine Learning

    Advanced certification in ML algorithms and implementation
